long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline Your LinkedIn and Pipedrive Integration – Now with AI Insights!

LinkMatch makes LinkedIn Pipedrive integration effortless, helping you focus on building connections and closing deals.

What LinkMatch Does for Pipedrive Users:
- Instant Recognition: See at a glance which LinkedIn profiles (people or organizations) are already in your Pipedrive database, thanks to clear color-coded indicators.
- Work Without Switching Tabs: View and edit profile details from Pipedrive directly within LinkedIn – no need to toggle back and forth.
- Save Time with Automation: Stop manually checking LinkedIn profiles. LinkMatch connects LinkedIn to Pipedrive, letting you save leads and contacts faster.
- NEW – AI Insights: Use AI-powered suggestions to identify high-priority leads, refine your outreach, and improve your sales process directly from LinkedIn.

This Pipedrive LinkedIn integration is designed for sales professionals who want to work smarter and save time. Whether you're managing contacts or finding new opportunities, LinkMatch optimizes your workflow every step of the way.

By installing this Chrome Extension, you agree to the Terms of Service: https://linkmatch.com/terms-of-use/ 

Browser permissions description for compliance with Chrome WebStore policies:

- tabs: for finding a tabs which has LinkedIn or Xing launched to show notification if needed
- notifications: show notifications when profile action is completed
- https://*.linkedin.com/* - to be able to make requests to linkedin.com
- https://*.xing.com/* - to be able to make requests to xing
- https://*.pipedrive.com/* - to be able to make requests to Pipedrive API
- https://*.linkmatch.net/* - API calls to LinkMatch(application server)
